parameterDecorators.name: _tokenType
parameterDecorators.description: is nft token type enum [ERC1155, ERC721].

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: is amount of allowed token - maxSupply.

functionDecorators.name: depositTokens
functionDecorators.description: allow nft token to be used as rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenType
parameterDecorators.description: is nft token type enum [ERC1155, ERC721].

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: is amount of allowed token - maxSupply.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: randomNumber
functionDecorators.description: generate random number from user seed and range.

functionDecorators.name: receiveTokens
functionDecorators.description: receive rewards by spending Lootbox NFT the caller should be Lootbox NFT holder.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: is the number of NFT to receive or number of Lootbox NFT to consume.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setLootboxTokenInfo
functionDecorators.description: function to set lootbox nft contract and lootbox nft token id.

parameterDecorators.name: _lootboxContract
parameterDecorators.description: is address for lootbox nft contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
